1597601940_16sixqep8qDvuNETTiPWPQP8fDpUb.body: What did the Balancer73 die of? Killed by the FSB or was he an alias,  a made-up character that the FSB self operated and as the propaganda project ended, the made up character had to "die"? I'm not saying that the possibility that he was a sincere dissident does not exist. I really do not know, what he was, but he sure was clever.
